#summary API Project
#labels API

= Project =

|| Protocol || HTTP ||
|| Control || OAuth ||
|| Data || JSON ||
|| Access || Group Admin ||

== Properties ==

|| *Name* || *Value* || *Interaction* ||
|| name || Project name || read/write ||
|| count || Number of members  || read/write ||
|| redirect || See [API_Redirect Redirect]  || read/write (use group if not project) ||
|| margins || See [API_Margins Margins]  || read/write (use group if not project) ||
|| identifier  || Project identifier || read-only ||
|| members  || Project membership || read-only ||

== Create ==

 Create a Project with
{{{
 GET /projects/data.json?name=Example&count=10
}}}
 or
{{{
 POST /projects
 --
 name=Example&count=10
}}}
 for request Mime-Type `application/x-www-form-urlencoded` and response Mime-Type `application/json`
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "0aefed",
     "name": "Example",
     "count": "10",
     "members": [
       "aef001",
       "aef002",
       "aef003",
       "aef004",
       "aef005",
       "aef006",
       "aef007",
       "aef008",
       "aef009",
       "aef00a"
     ]
   }
 ]
}}}

== Update/Modify/Write ==

{{{
 POST /projects/0aefed/data.json
 --
 [
   {
     "identifier": "0aefed",
     "name": "Example",
     "count": "10",
     "redirect": ?,
     "margins": ?
   }
 ]
}}}
 for request and response Mime-Type `application/json`

 Read-only fields are optional

== List members ==

{{{
 GET /projects/0fac9/data.json
}}}
 for response Mime-Type `application/json`
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "0fac9",
     "name": "Example",
     "count": "10",
     "members": [
       "ofc001",
       "ofc002",
       "ofc003",
       "ofc004",
       "ofc005",
       "ofc006",
       "ofc007",
       "ofc008",
       "ofc009",
       "ofc00a"
     ],
     "redirect": ?,
     "margins": ?
   }
 ]
}}}

== List Results ==

{{{
 GET /projects/0fac9/results.json
}}}
 for response Mime-Type `application/json`
{{{
 [
   {
     "identifier": "0fac9",
     "name": "Example",
     "count": "10",
     "members": {
       "ofc001": {
         "st": "1.0",
         "nt": "1.0",
         "nf": "1.0",
         "sf": "1.0"
       },
       "ofc002": {
         /* empty = status incomplete */
       },
       "ofc003": {
         "st": "1.0",
         "nt": "1.0",
         "nf": "1.0",
         "sf": "1.0"
       }
     },
     "redirect": ?,
     "margins": ?
   }
 ]
}}}
